basicQuest.title: Spot a Cloud
basicQuest.description:
Clouds are drifting poems in the sky â€” always moving, always changing. Taking a moment to spot one is a quiet act of wonder.

Look up. Find a shape. Watch it shift. Let it remind you that thoughts pass, moods pass â€” and you're allowed to just *observe*.

AiSnap.taskDescription: a cloud in the sky, any shape
